description: A modal dialog component. This will be rendered above the content of the main window and can either be dismissed by the user or configured to require user interaction before dismissal.

props.name: open
props.description: Whether the modal is currently open.

props.name: dismissible
props.description: Whether the user is allowed to dismiss the modal by clicking outside the modal or pressing escape.

props.name: opaque
props.description: Increase the opacity so that the page behind the modal is no longer visible

props.name: showTopNav
props.description: Keep the top nav visible when the modal is open

events.name: close
events.description: Emitted when the modal is closed.
